channel.title: Commands not working in battlescape?
channel.description: I made myself admin and I changed Paladino76 in the source file to my player name but still nothing. Any suggestions?

item.title: Commands not working in battlescape?
item.dc:creator: @v0x v0x
item.description:
@v0x wrote:

Your character file should look like this if your an admin/owner

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = Voxy
character-password = *************

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2557
character-posy = 3442
character-rights = 3[/code]

1=mod
2=admin
3=owner

Also, just because you have changed your name in the source file doesnt really mean anything, there could of been alot of instances where the owner of the original battlescape had his name put in certain places to allow only him to be able to avoid or use certain functions.

If this doesnâ€™t help, then please explain your problem more clearly.

Read full topic
